member.name: MFPinholeCameraIntrinsic_IntrinsicModel
member.summary: Represents a pinhole camera intrinsic model for a specified resolution.

member.name: MFPinholeCameraIntrinsic_IntrinsicModel.Width
member.summary: The width for the pinhole camera intrinsic model, in pixels.

member.name: MFPinholeCameraIntrinsic_IntrinsicModel.Height
member.summary: The height for the pinhole camera intrinsic model, in pixels.
